snippet: At the White House’s request, Kickstarter has begun its first social service campaign aimed at raising money for the United Nations refugee agency on behalf of Syrian refugees.
abstract: Pres Obama uses crowdfunding website Kickstarter to raise money for United Nations refugee agency on behalf of Syrian refugees; weeklong campaign raises more than $550,000 in first day.

byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: At the White House’s request, Kickstarter has begun its first social service campaign aimed at raising money for the United Nations refugee agency on behalf of Syrian refugees.

headline.main: Obama Turns to Crowdfunding to Aid Fleeing Syrians
headline.print_headline: Obama Turns to Crowdfunding to Aid Fleeing Syrians

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
